description:
Duggy is a cool arcade game where you are hunting the score.
Are you better than your friends ?
Find it out and dig your way down.

Features:
- Handdrawn pixel art with love
- Arcade style game play which is easy to play
- Over 40+ Levels with faster and dangerous enemies
name: Duggy
intro: A homage to the good old arcade games. Are you ready to dig ?
